text: (ai eemaanadaaron) tum mein se jin logon ne eemaan qubool kiya aur achchhe achchhe kaam kie un se khuda ne vaayada kiya ki un ko (ek na ek) din rue zameen par zarur (apana) naeb muqarrar karega jis tarah un logon ko naeb banaaya jo unase pahale guzar chuke hain aur jis deen ko usane unake lie pasand pharamaaya hai (islaam) us par unhen zarur zarur pooree qudarat dega aur unake khaef hone ke baad (unakee har aas ko) aman se zarur badal dega ki vah (itmenaan se) meree hee ibaadat karenge aur kisee ko hamaara shareek na banaenge aur jo shakhs isake baad bhee naashukree kare to aise hee log badakaar hain
